sections.content:
Question:
What boards are suitable for evaluating the RX26T?
Answer:
The RX26T evaluation boards sold by Renesas include the MCB and MCK described below.
MCB-RX26T Renesas flexible motor control CPU board :
The MCB-RX26T is equipped with an on-chip emulator circuit (equivalent to E2-Lite) so that user can start developing applications simply by connecting it to a PC debugger with a USB cable. 
This MCB-RX26T comes with a 100-pin package in two different types.
Type A: Model R5F526TFCDFP without TSIP-Lite
Type B: Model R5F526TFDDFP with TSIP-Lite
MCK-RX26T Renesas Flexible Motor Control Kit :
The MCK-RX26T is a development kit that makes it easy to evaluate motor control via a permanent magnet synchronous motor (brushless DC motor). With this kit and sample code downloadable from the website or Renesas Motor Workbench 3.0, user can immediately start evaluating motor control with the RX26T. 
(Included: MCB-RX26T Type A, inverter board (MCI-LV-1), communication board (MC-COM), permanent magnet synchronous motor, and accessories (cables, spacers, etc.))
Suitable Products
RX26T
